attributes.action: Keep the last Battle of Britain Hurricane in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The last airworthy Hawker Hurricane that took part in the Battle of Britain is being advertsied for sale via an American dealership, it would be a tragedy if this historic aricraft was allowed to leave this country.

 I believe it should be purchaed for the nation and made part of the Battle of Britain Memorial Flight at RAF Conningsby.

The cost is a mere £2.5 Million. A small price to pay to commemorate the "forgotten" pilots of Hurricanes who contribute so much in the defence of this country
